title: Bug 14047 - StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: When appending N lines to a StyledText in word wrap mode, it results in N redraws of the entire client area.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Open the application with a StyledText widget in word wrap mode.
2. Append N lines of text to the StyledText.
3. Observe the redraw behavior and notice that the entire client area is redrawn N times during the text change.
